name: Diamond Crush 2
description:
We love Pirates and we love Diamonds! Take a shot at crushing as many colorful gems as you can in this fast paced puzzle game. Beat your friends' high scores in the Weekly Tournament to earn even more coins.

The most exciting game now on your phone. Let's get started!

+++ FEATURES +++

● Pirates!
● Cartoon graphics and colorful diamonds
● Fast paced & rich game play
● Easy and fun to play, but very challenging
● Rich social network support with Facebook
● Support Apple Game Center
● Dedicated leader boards for you and your friends
● Weekly tournament to challenge your friends
● Power ups to help you increase your score
● Earn hundreds of coins by competing with your friends
● Seamless synchronization with Facebook
● Regular updates with new features and power-ups


+++ RULES +++

Very simple and straightforward:

● Match three or more same color gems as FAST you can!
● Use power-ups to maximize your chances
● Play against your friends, and challenge their score!
● Have Fun.....

Diamond Crush 2 is fully integrated with Facebook. Invite your Facebook friends to play your own personalized tournaments. Play on your mobile and your Facebook scores, friends and tournament will stay in sync! Crush diamonds until you have filled up the Energy Bar and use incredible power ups to score even higher!


The game is FREE but you will need hearts to keep enjoying the fun.
You have 3 options:

• Purchase coins and use them to buy hearts.
• Invite your friends to play and receive coins back
• Send hearts to your friends. For every heart you send you will get one back
• Wait few minutes for a refill (6 min/heart)

If you have any problem or suggestions please email us. We love compliments but we love constructive criticism as well and we take it very seriously to improve our games and your experience.
If you would like to contact us about issues or suggestions write at contact@redbitgames.it


Enjoy Diamond Crush 2!
